thread.title: Biden Checking ‘Emotional Fuel’ as He Considers a Presidential Run
thread.title_full: Biden Checking ‘Emotional Fuel’ as He Considers a Presidential Run - WSJ

author: Peter Nicholas
title: Biden Checking ‘Emotional Fuel’ as He Considers a Presidential Run
text:
Vice President Joe Biden, who is gauging whether to jump in the presidential campaign, told Democratic Party officials on Wednesday that he wanted to make sure he had the emotional energy needed to mount a campaign.
Mr. Biden spoke to Democratic National Committee members in a conference call devoted to the Iran nuclear deal negotiated by the Obama administration. During the call he got a question about his own White House ambitions. Mr. Biden has been huddling with senior advisers and reaching out to Democratic... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
